name: Woo Sendy Subscriptions
author: Indatos Technologies

sections.description:
Add USERS from your WooCommerce store to Sendy mailer list when they complete purchase on WooCommerce store.

Features:

  • Option to connect with your sendy
  • Option to select/enter name of list
  • All the users who make a successful purchase will be added to list.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/woocommerce-sendy-subscriptions directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WooCommerce->Settings->Integration screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Add USERS from your WooCommerce store to Sendy mailer list when they complete purchase on WooCommerce store.
